entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:31 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:31 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 70%
